time_mm.label: Time in Minutes
time_mm.helpText: Place the number custom field ID to store the total time in Minutes (ceiled)

time_ms.label: Time in Milliseconds
time_ms.helpText: Place the number custom field ID to store the total time in Milliseconds

app.description: This is a simple time tracker that counts the time a ticket is open and requires Agents to submit this time before letting them them update ticket.
app.name: Time Tracking

settings_error: Please check the app settings to allow the agent to submit custom or actual time.
